greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product of terms in n-th row of A076110.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..230
formula: a(n) = n^n * Pochhammer(n, 1 + 1/n). - _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
maple: seq( mul(j*n+1, j=1..n), n=0..15); # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
program: (PARI) vector(16, n, my(m=n-1); prod(j=1,m, j*m+1)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
(MAGMA) [1] cat [&*[j*n+1: j in [1..n]]: n in [1..15]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
(Sage) [product(j*n+1 for j in (1..n)) for n in (0..15)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
(GAP) List([0..15], n-> Product([1..n], j-> j*n+1) ); # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Oct 09 2002
ext: More terms from Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Apr 20 2003
